title: Hallowed Grass Wall
info: Hallowed Grass Wall is a type of wall. Like the grass of the Hallow, it has a notable hue of cyan and often features small flowers. On the  Desktop version and  Mobile version, it is sold by the Dryad during a Blood Moon. In all other versions, it can be destroyed, but not harvested, making it unobtainable as an item.
stat:
Placeable
Use time15 (Very fast)
Rarity00*
Sell50
Research400 required
